section.title: printGraphToFile()

para.computeroutput: void printGraphToFile (const undirectedGraph & graph, std::string fileDir, std::string graphName, std::string format)

para.para: Prints a graph to a file using Graphviz.

section.para: This function writes a Boost undirected graph to a Graphviz DOT file. It then converts the DOT file to the specified output format (e.g., PNG, SVG) using the Graphviz "dot" command. The resulting file is saved in the specified directory with the given graph name.

entry.para: The directory where the output file will be saved.
The name of the output file without the file extension.
The desired output format ("png", "svg", or any other format to generate both).

para.para: Updates a text file with additional content.

section.para: This function reads the content of the input file, inserts new text at a specific line, and writes the updated content to a new output file. The new file name is derived by appending "Updated" to the original file name. The input file should exist and be accessible.

entry.para: The path to the input file.
